properties.areaDesc: Waters from Port Mansfield TX to the Rio Grande River from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 2 at 10:04PM CST until February 4 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas
5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Baffin Bay to the Rio Grande extending from
20 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST TUESDAY
